message.body: Hey today I'm going to go to best buy for a microwave... should I just get one and tell you after? I dont wana get it on Amazon. A lot were saying.the order will take time ro deliver, and.plus I wana see.them.in person. The prices aren't much different
I'm looking at microwaves around 2.2 cubic feet, 1100 watts or better
But i don't know anything about brands
Actually how about, what if I buy it after dinner, can I bring it to your house?
I can go with you after dinner if you want
Not that I know what im looking for either lol
Haha I think brands are the Gardner to figure out. But mostly, if you heard of the brand, then it's good. I mainly wana make sure it's not cheaply constructed and is easy to use.
For steph, how does this sound: a SOA blanket... OR a SOA zippo lighter
Ok... how you getting there? Im driving in with mom
Are you leavin yet? They started serving appetizers and ordered entrees already
On my way to get mom now... she couldn't leave work earlier than 545
& I got caught up at work myself
